amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.para: The powers vested in cities and villages under sections 19-701 to 19-707 shall be conferred upon cities of the primary class, cities of the first class, cities of the second class, and villages, whether or not such city or village is operating under a home rule charter adopted pursuant to Article XI of the Constitution of Nebraska.
